alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 30 at 2:43PM CDT until April 01 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON FRIDAY TO 7 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Traverse and Big Stone Counties. In South Dakota, Roberts and Grant Counties. * WHEN...From noon Friday to 7 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. In Minnesota, the latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1. In South Dakota, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
